snippet.textDisplay:
He kept yelling at him for running away when she was getting mad and was going to hurt him. Johnny went to a friends house or left the house to let her be because he doesn't want to sock her right in the face. He wanted to talk to her and try to work things out but that won't work. She don't like that, she gets heated.

This woman Jesus, she needs to go back in the womb for cooking. Because she ain't done.
